edu.vt.cbil.visda.data
Class Project

java.lang.Object
  edu.vt.cbil.visda.data.Project

public class Project
extends java.lang.Object

The culmination of raw and classification data concerned with the same sets of genes and experiments.

copyDataSetIfNecessary

public void copyDataSetIfNecessary(DataSet dataSet)
If the dataSet does not live in the projectHome directory, then copy it to the projectHome dir and let the dataSet know it moved.

Parameters:
dataSet - any dataset

save

public void save()
Save the project if it is dirty and copy data files if necessary.
  • create the projectHome directory if it does not exist.
  • save the properties every project must have
  • save the properties that only some projects will have
  • copy datasets to the project directory as necessary

saveProperties

public void saveProperties()
Remember the current value of all key/value pairs in the Properties instance.
